message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This exceptional item holds immense value to me and is worth $15,000 to you. Considering its unique features and high demand, I am offering it to you at a special price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to ensure you receive a great deal while allowing me to maximize the return on my investment. I believe this price reflects the true worth of the product and presents an excellent chance for both of us to benefit. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
